start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative


As an operator I want to create a new organisation

Scenario: Operator successfully creates an organisation


scenario valid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given a valid organisation @name with @organisationIdentification and functionGroup @functionGroup
when creating a new organization
then the organization will be added to the platform
and the operator receives feedback about the addition

valid organisation
name organisationIdentification functionGroup
Gemeente Heerlen heerlen USER
scenario valid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid organisation Gemeente Heerlen with heerlen and functionGroup USER
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist creating a new organization
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the organization will be added to the platform
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the operator receives feedback about the addition

Scenario: Operator creates an already existing organisation


scenario valid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given a valid organisation @name with @organisationIdentification and functionGroup @functionGroup
when creating an organisation that already exists on the platform
then the organisation is not added to the platform
and the operator receives an error message indicating that the organisation already exists

valid organisation
name organisationIdentification functionGroup
Gemeente Heerlen heerlen USER
scenario valid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a valid organisation Gemeente Heerlen with heerlen and functionGroup USER
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist creating an organisation that already exists on the platform
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the organisation is not added to the platform
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the operator receives an error message indicating that the organisation already exists

Scenario: Operator creates an organisation with an invalid organisation identification


scenario invalid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given an invalid organisation @name with @organisationIdentification and functionGroup @functionGroup
when creating an organisation with an invalid organization identification
then the organisation is not added to the platform due to the invalid organisation
and the operator will receive an error message

invalid organisation
name organisationIdentification functionGroup
Gemeente Heerlen USER
scenario invalid organisation name organisationIdentification functionGroup
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist an invalid organisation Gemeente Heerlen with and functionGroup USER
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist creating an organisation with an invalid organization identification
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the organisation is not added to the platform due to the invalid organisation
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the operator will receive an error message

Scenario: Operator can query all organisations on the platform


script
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist two organisations
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the operator views the list of organisations
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist a list with the two organisations is returned
